snippet: A video published on Tuesday and said to be from the Baba Amr neighborhood of Homs, Syria, showed a direct view of the intense bombardment.
abstract: A video published on Tuesday and said to be from the Baba Amr neighborhood of Homs, Syria, showed a direct view of the intense bombardment.
lead_paragraph: The shriek of ordnance cut through an activist's frightened and repeated prayers as he filmed scenes of intense bombardment in the city of Homs, Syria.

headline.main: As Diplomats Visit Damascus, Video Shows Bombardment in Homs
